response.overview: Hector and Alex are the grandchildren of Felisa, deceased due to Amyotrophic Lateral Sclerosis, known as ELA. A neurodegenerative disease that paralyzes the muscles and organs of the patient until it kills him. Both brothers decided to undertake a unique trip to give visibility to the disease.
response.tagline: Hector and Alex are the grandchildren of Felisa, deceased due to Amyotrophic Lateral Sclerosis, known as ELA. A neurodegenerative disease that paralyzes the muscles and organs of the patient until it kills him.
response.title: Pedaela. Aquello que nos salva
